name: City National Bank of Wichita Falls, for use, v. Atkinson, et al., Appellants

judges: Before Frazer, O. J., Simpson, Kbphart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: City National Bank of Wichita Falls, for use, v. Atkinson, et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The law applicable to the undisputed facts of this case is clearly and correctly stated in the opinion of Judge Patterson. Upon that opinion the judgment of the lower court is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John A. Metz, with him Charles L. Wilmot and John A. Metz, Jr., for appellants.
W. Denning Stewart, with him W. Clyde Crubbs, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
City National Bank of Wichita Falls, for use, v. Atkinson, et al., Appellants.
Argued October 5, 1934.
Before Frazer, O. J., Simpson, Kbphart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
John A. Metz, with him Charles L. Wilmot and John A. Metz, Jr., for appellants.
W. Denning Stewart, with him W. Clyde Crubbs, for appellee.
November 26, 1934:
